item.title: Boxplot with trend line
item.description: Background Last week my colleague showed me a drawn graph and asked can we plot this kind of graph. It is a graph with grouped boxplot. Additionally, it contains a trend line that connects mean of each data box. So this post explains how to draw a graph like that using two ways; r ggplot2 library r base plots (used codes from The R Graph Gallery - https://www.r-graph-gallery.com/146-boxplot-for-time-series/) The data This data is sample data set from my colleague.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am PhD student who works with GIS, Remote Sensing data in r. This is my first blog using the blogdown package. I will post r codes that I use for my work.
